segments.text: I see the woman standing there, drying that plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't even notice the water all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is soaked, but she just keeps on drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, taking those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really risking it, standing on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, ready to help or catch any falling cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long they've been planning this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is getting more and more chaotic by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how peaceful the garden looks outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is going to be so surprised when she finally looks up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one gets hurt with all that water and the wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR
